mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by id) no, n.*, m.name from notice n left outer join member m on n.writer = m.user_id order by no desc
select n.*, m.name from notice n left outer join member m on n.writer = m.user_id where n.id = #{id} order by id
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writer, filepath, filename) values (#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
